    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Increments the timer using delta time so that it will count up in seconds. Updates the labels in the HUD: the timer label, the score label and the fortress count label
        Parameters:
        dt - delta time

      • getFinalScore

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
